name: Beary In-Tents
description:
Inspired by real bear encounters at Alder Lake, Beary In-Tents is a multiplayer party game about avoiding bear attacks by throwing trash over to your opponents' campsite.

How to Play:

Player One Controls:

Moves with W to go forward, A to go left, S to go down, and D to go right.

Pick-up  Item: L-Ctrl

Throw Item:  L-Shift

Player Two Controls:

Moves with arrows keys, Up arrow goes up, Left arrow goes left, Down arrow to go down, Right arrow to go right.

Pick-up Item: R-Ctrl

Throw Item: R-Shift

Made by: Bearly Koalafied
